guardian.title: Yemen embassies closed over security fears
guardian.topComment: The world is going to hell in a handcart then.. We can't JUST blame Islaamists.. Blair & Bush helped with Jihaadi recruitment somewhat methinks!!

guardian.title: Tim Cook hails Apple Watch health benefits
guardian.topComment: In that case stop flogging tablets and phones which really only encourage sitting on your arse.

guardian.title: Jon Stewart to leave Daily Show
guardian.topComment: If your wondering why Jon Stewart's departure is such a big deal, then you're either too old to understand his importance or too young to believe in the need for voices such as his.

guardian.title: Isis war to extend far beyond Iraq and Syria under Obama plan
guardian.topComment: At some point, perhaps the voting classes will wake up to realize people like Obama have no plan, just as W had no plan, and Clinton had no plan, etc.
